is_local_ring_hom_of_iso:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
theorem is_local_ring_hom_of_iso {R S : CommRing} (f : «expr ≅ » R S) : is_local_ring_hom f.hom :=
  {
    map_nonunit := fun a ha => by
      convert f.inv.is_unit_map ha
      rw [category_theory.iso.hom_inv_id_apply] }
#align is_local_ring_hom_of_iso is_local_ring_hom_of_iso
epi:
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Andrew Yang
-/
theorem is_localization.epi {R : Type _} [CommRing R] (M : Submonoid R) (S : Type _) [CommRing S] [algebra R S]
    [is_localization M S] : Epi (CommRing.of_hom <| algebra_map R S) :=
  ⟨fun T f₁ f₂ => @is_localization.ring_hom_ext R _ M S _ _ T _ _ _ _⟩
#align is_localization.epi is_localization.epi
